00020 struct EmbC *__embc = 0;

00022 static void lock(void) { /* noop for now? */ }
00023 static void unlock(void) { /* noop for now? */ }
00024 void *(*mbuff_alloc)(const char *, unsigned long) = 0;
00025 void (*mbuff_free)(const char *, void *) = 0;
00026 int (*rt_printk)(const char *, ...) = 0;

00028 int init(void)
00029 {
00030   __embc = mbuff_alloc(__embc_ShmName, sizeof(struct EmbC));
00031   if (!__embc) {
00032     rt_printk("%s: could not allocate shm!\n", __embc_ShmName);
00033     return -ENOMEM;
00034   }
00035   memset(__embc, 0, sizeof(*__embc));
00036   __embc->init = __embc_init;
00037   __embc->cleanup = __embc_cleanup;
00038   __embc->statetransition = __embc_transition;
00039   __embc->tick = __embc_tick; /* may be NULL if user code didn't specify a function */
00040   __embc->entry = &__embc_fsm_do_state_entry;
00041   __embc->exit = &__embc_fsm_do_state_exit;
00042   __embc->get_at = &__embc_fsm_get_at;
00043   __embc->lock = &lock;
00044   __embc->unlock = &unlock;
00045   __embc->threshold_detect = __embc_threshold_detect; /* may be NULL if user code didn't specify a function! */
00046   return 0;
00047 }
00048 
00049 void cleanup(void)
00050 {
00051   if (__embc) {
00052     memset(__embc, 0, sizeof(*__embc));
00053     mbuff_free(__embc_ShmName, __embc);
00054     __embc = 0;  
00055   }
00056 }
